query.name: Combined Tuna
query.value: merge on (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on '193c45d0-2dc2-11df-b225-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on 'b667b340-2dee-11df-82d0-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on 'b94a3010-2f6a-11df-88a6-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on '229c98d0-2e00-11df-895e-c3cdbbfc5d76'))

query.name: Sardinia search
query.value: merge on (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on '193c45d0-2dc2-11df-b225-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on 'b667b340-2dee-11df-82d0-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on 'b94a3010-2f6a-11df-88a6-c3cdbbfc5d76')) and (retrievemetadata as 'aquamaps' in 'ENGLISH' on (fulltextsearch by 'tuna' in 'ENGLISH' on '229c98d0-2e00-11df-895e-c3cdbbfc5d76'))

query.name: Sardinia query
query.value: retrievemetadata as 'es' in 'ENGLISH' on (join inner by 'DocID' on (fulltextsearch by 'sardinia' in 'ENGLISH' on 'b6c5bf00-f440-11dd-a6ff-add312924299') and (merge on (spatialsearch contains polygon (7.275 41.53, 10.204 41.53, 10.204 38.694, 7.275 38.694) in 'ENGLISH' on '778b3e50-f2a6-11dd-8d14-904a5718339a' as 'es') and (spatialsearch intersect polygon (7.275 41.53, 10.204 41.53, 10.204 38.694, 7.275 38.694) in 'ENGLISH' on '778b3e50-f2a6-11dd-8d14-904a5718339a' as 'es') and (spatialsearch inside polygon (7.275 41.53, 10.204 41.53, 10.204 38.694, 7.275 38.694) in 'ENGLISH' on '778b3e50-f2a6-11dd-8d14-904a5718339a' as 'es')) )
